question: Who was appointed as the Editor of the Economic and Political Weekly (EPW)?
explanation: Gopal Guru was appointed as the Editor of the Economic and Political Weekly (EPW). Gopal Guru is a professor and political scientist. He currently works at the Jawaharlal Nehru University (JNU) in New Delhi. He teaches Political Science. Paranjoy Guha Thakurta resigned as the Editor of EPW last year. He resigned following accusations that he had initiated unilateral legal proceedings against a business group after legal notice was served on an article.
